title: 82/293/EEC: Commission Decision of 13 April 1982 establishing that the apparatus described as 'Jeol - Electron Microscope, model Temscan-200CX', may not be imported free of Common Customs Tariff duties
header:
COMMISSION  DECISION
of 13 April 1982
establishing that the apparatus described as 'Jeol - Electron Microscope, model Temscan-200CX', may not be imported free of Common Customs Tariff duties
(82/293/EEC)
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN
COMMUNITIES
main_body: The apparatus described as 'Jeol - Electron Microscope, model Temscan-200CX', which is the subject of an application by the Federal Republic of Germany of 24 September 1981, may not be imported free of Common Customs Tariff duties.
This Decision is addressed to the Member States.
attachments:
